org.hps.recon.tracking

Class ClassicAmbiguityResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.AmbiguityResolver
      • org.hps.recon.tracking.ClassicAmbiguityResolver

  • public class ClassicAmbiguityResolver
extends AmbiguityResolver
    Performs: removal of duplicates, removal of partials, removal of shared tracks based on number of shared-hits, removal of poor scoring tracks. Track scoring considers holes, bad channels, layer acceptances. No track cleaning.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.hps.recon.tracking.AmbiguityResolver

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassicAmbiguityResolver

        public ClassicAmbiguityResolver(AcceptanceHelper helper)
        Constructor with AcceptanceHelper (used in track scoring). Defaults: score threshold 50, share threshold 0, cumProb threshold 0.95, chi2 scoring factor 2.0, bad chi2 penalty 30, doChargeCheck false
        Parameters:
        AcceptanceHelper -

        public void setOutsideAcceptancePenalties(double[] penalties)
        Parameters:
        penalties - : for track-scoring. Entry i of array = value subtracted from score for missing the acceptance of layer i+1

        public void setHolePenalties(double[] penalties)

        public void setBadChi2Penalty(double penalty)
        Parameters:
        penalty - : for track-scoring. Value subtracted from score for having a bad overall chi2/dof

        Parameters:
